texts.name: Sinara
texts.biography: Sinara has a heart of gold, and a voice that is said to make butterflies dance on the winds. She is also an excellent musician for playing harp.

specialty.description: Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Sibyls or Enchantresses or each level attained after 5th level.
specialty.tooltip:
{Flower Dragons}

Increases the Attack and Defense skills of Flower Dragons or Rainbow Dragons.
specialty.name: Sibyls
